entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • RefreshView makes CollectionView use all available vertical space despite VerticalOptions=Center on CollectionView #14479
  • CollectionView in RefreshView VerticalOptions Center doesn't work correctly #14478
  • CollectionView in RefreshView is not showing in VerticalStackLayout but is showing in StackLayout #14477
  • Slider is very broken, Value is a mess when setting Minimum #14472
  • [Android] Image can dissapear when going back to the page. #14471
  • Cannot navigate to page when Shell menu item has IsVisible=False #14470
  • Setting shell menu item ("ShellContent") IsVisible to false breaks unrelated page menu item or routing #14469
  • [Windows] Shell header is not visible because It's merged with page graphics #14468
  • [Windows] IsVisible on shell menu items through ViewModel randomly duplicates shell menu items #14467
  • [Windows/WinUI] Main window doesn't have an accessible name by default #14465

Closed

  • Label TapGestureRecognizer not firing #14480
  • Technical Question: How do you add a file/module to Android App Bundle (AAB) Modules in MAUI? #14473
  • Inside Stacklayout ScrollView not working #4176 #14293

PullRequests

Created

  • [CI] Do not rebuild the ms tasks on device tests. #14476
  • `FocusRequest` is now a `RetrievePlatformValueRequest` #14475
  • Refactor the device tests to avoid duplicate tests #14466

Updated

  • Fix iOS ListView cell gone hidden (#11287) #13669
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area/ListView
  • Replace Shell sans-serif-medium magic string on Android #13544
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/fonts 🅰️
  • [Android] Properly remove the Frame's border thickness from the measureSpec #14452
    area/controls 🎮, control-frame
